# hiveio_host (Data Source)

A data source to retrieve host information by ip or hostname.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `hostname` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ip_address` (String)

### Read-Only

- `cluster_id` (String)
- `hostid` (String)
- `software_version` (String)
